entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 12:12 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
